attributes.action: Encourage people to wear masks in public area (tube especially) amid COVID19
attributes.additional_details: NHS defines close contact with contagious people as 'being within 2 metres for more than 15 minutes' - millions of London commuters fit this criteria. Therefore, wearing masks in public areas/transportations can greatly help slow down the spread of coronavirus. Act now before too late.

Guidance for people with confirmed or possible coronavirus (COVID-19) infection is being developed by Public Health England, and decisions about medical advice are a matter for medical professionals and the NHS.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
